comments.body:
I have tested this in EDGE mode and was successful.  I am now testing in MANAGED-NOVLAN and running into problems accessing instances after OS upgrade.  I did not see any noticeable errors in the pack/unpack output. I am seeing these errors when launching/rebooting instances:
{code}
[root@d-14 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-8ba0b2f2 --region 000652306855:testuser@localhost

Tested this in VPC cloud with ceph as BS/OS and had problems after upgrade.  I could not access instances after upgrade.  I discovered I missed some midonet configuration settings with adding host to the midonet tunnel.  After I modified the settings, I was able to access the instances.  However, an instance was terminated and lost in the process.  I'm not exactly sure how that happened since the instance was never manually terminated or removed from the new NC.  I will do an upgrade with a single NC and see if I can reproduce.
